solution_line_template: The width of his garden is going to be {property_width} / {garden_width_divisor} = <<{property_width}/{garden_width_divisor}={garden_width}>>{garden_width} feet.
The length of his garden is going to be {property_length} / {garden_length_divisor} = <<{property_length}/{garden_length_divisor}={garden_length}>>{garden_length} feet.
So the area of his garden is going to be {garden_width} X {garden_length} = {garden_area} square feet.
